title.narrative: Technical assistance, operational and implementation support to improve quality of education in seven regions and at the national level

description.narrative: This activity (Technical assistance, operational and implementation support to improve quality of education in seven regions and at the national level) is a component of Education Quality Improvement Programme – Tanzania (EQUIP-T) reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £43,377,069. This component benefits Tanzania, and works in the following sector(s): Education policy and administrative management, Teacher training, Primary education. , with the following implementing partners: Crown Agents Limited, Mott MacDonald Limited. The start date is 16-11-2012 and the end date is 31-12-2020.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA

description.narrative: Education - Social Affairs - Education - administration, policy and planning
